name: KN Social Slide
author: Freddie Aziz Jasbindar

sections.description:
• We make setting up a simple slide to your wordpress and lets your visitors know about your facebook, twitter, feedburner email subscriptions and google+ and random post from your own wordpress. Don’t worry, you can turn on and off, re-position and re-order any slide you don’t want to anytime.

Demo

  • http://www.kakiheboh.com
  • http://www.thegarang.com
  • http://www.kirinselamaperak.com
  • http://www.cikapasaja.com

Customizable

  • Reposition any slide
  • Reorder any slide
  • On and off unwanted slide
  • Auto open for random post
  • Show how many tweet (1 ~ 4)

Feature

  • Facebook Fanpage
  • Twitter Profile
  • Google + Page
  • Feedburner Email Subscriptions
  • Random entry from your own blog
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload the file kn-social-slide.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Please change the settings and enjoy!

Updating

If you had a trouble in updating this plugin, try deactive old version and delete the folder kn-social-slide from the /wp-content/plugins/ directory. Then, try download new version and install as usual.
sections.faq:
The slide doesn’t work?

  • Try to turn on/off the jQuery.noconflict at setting page

The slide still doesn’t work after turn on/off jQuery.noconflict?

  • May have conflict with other plugins or template. Try deactive all plugin, then detect which plugin cause this problem by try active them 1 by 1. If the slide still not working, change the template!

How to ask other question?

  • Email me at hai@kakinetwork.com
sections.changelog:
1.1.5 – 22 January 2011

  • New : Show how many (1 ~ 4) tweet do you want for twitter.

1.1.4 – 13 January 2011

  • Fix : Google Plus Page form problem.

1.1.3 – 13 January 2011

  • New : Google Plus Page improvement.
  • Change : Small styling change.

1.1.2 – 7 January 2011

  • New : Feedburner slide for Email Subscriptions.
  • New : Facebook like, Tweet & Google + button on Random Post slide.
  • New : Auto Open option for random post.
  • Fix : Improvement in off function.
  • Fix : Coding mistake.

1.1.1 – 6 January 2011

  • New : Improvement in setting page.
  • New : Random post is available now for you guys!

1.0.3 – 5 January 2011

  • New : Status notice on setting page.
  • Fix : Repair some depreciated php tag.
  • Fix : Mistake on version number after save settings.
  • Change : After upgrade, no need to setting up anymore!
  • Trash : Remove footer on setting page. I found it’s a bit annoying.

1.0.2 – 4 January 2011

  • Fix : Small fix for twitter slide.
  • Trash : Delete unused image.

1.0.1 – 3 January 2011

  • New : First release.

short_description: KN Social Slide is a free WordPress Plugin that lets your visitors know about your facebook, twitter, google+, feedburner and random entry!
